languages.text: "Это был не Император, Лорд-капитан. Лишь то, как леди Кибелла его видела. Фантазм, рожденный воображением. Увы, никто из братьев моих не обладает таким могуществом, чтобы донести до вас голос Защитника Человечества".

"That was not the Emperor, Lord Captain. It was merely Mistress Kibellah's vision of Him. A figment born out of her imagination. Alas, none among my fellows are powerful enough to bring you the voice of the Protector of Mankind."
languages.original_text: "Это был не Император, Лорд-капитан. Лишь то, как леди Кибелла его видела. Фантазм, рожденный воображением. Увы, никто из братьев моих не обладает таким могуществом, чтобы донести до вас голос Защитника Человечества".

traits.locale_text: "It was not the Emperor, Lord Captain. It was merely Lady Kibellah's vision of Him. A figment born out of her imagination. Alas, none among my fellows are as powerful as to bring you the voice of the Protector of Mankind."

"It was not the Emperor, Lord Captain. It was merely Lady Kibellah's vision of Him. A figment born out of her imagination. Alas, none among my fellows are as powerful as to bring you the voice of the Protector of Mankind."

languages.text: « Ce n'était pas l'Empereur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ce n'était que la vision qu'en a eu maîtresse Kibellah. Une simple projection née de son imagination. Hélas, aucun de mes compagnons n'est assez puissant pour vous transmettre la voix du Protecteur de l'Humanité. »
languages.original_text: "That was not the Emperor, Lord Captain. It was merely Mistress Kibellah's vision of Him. A figment born out of her imagination. Alas, none among my fellows are powerful enough to bring you the voice of the Protector of Mankind."

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'était pas l'Empereur, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. Ce n'était que la vision qu'en a eu maîtresse Kibellah. Une simple projection née de son imagination. Hélas, aucun de mes compagnons n'est assez puissant pour vous transmettre la voix du Protecteur de l'Humanité. »

languages.text: «No era el Emperador, Lord Capitán. Solo era la visión que la maestra Kibellah tiene de Él. Un retazo de su imaginación. Lamentablemente, ninguno de mis compañeros es lo bastante poderoso como para transmitirle la voz del Protector de la Humanidad».
languages.original_text: "That was not the Emperor, Lord Captain. It was merely Mistress Kibellah's vision of Him. A figment born out of her imagination. Alas, none among my fellows are powerful enough to bring you the voice of the Protector of Mankind."

traits.locale_text: «No era el Emperador, Lord Capitán. Solo era la visión que la maestra Kibellah tiene de Él. Un retazo de su imaginación. Lamentablemente, ninguno de mis compañeros es lo bastante poderoso como para transmitirle la voz del Protector de la Humanidad».

languages.text: 「あれは皇帝ではありません、ロード・キャプテン。あの皇帝はキベラ氏のビジョンにすぎません。彼女の想像から生まれた作り物です。残念ながら我々の仲間の中に、人類の守護者の声を届けられるほどの力を持った者はいないのです」
languages.original_text: "That was not the Emperor, Lord Captain. It was merely Mistress Kibellah's vision of Him. A figment born out of her imagination. Alas, none among my fellows are powerful enough to bring you the voice of the Protector of Mankind."

traits.locale_text: 「あれは皇帝ではありません、ロード・キャプテン。あの皇帝はキベラ氏のビジョンにすぎません。彼女の想像から生まれた作り物です。残念ながら我々の仲間の中に、人類の守護者の声を届けられるほどの力を持った者はいないのです」

languages.text: “那并不是帝皇，舰长大人。那仅仅是绮贝菈女士对祂的想象，是她凭空捏造出来的。遗憾的是，我身边的同伴的力量不足，无法为您带来人类守护者真正的声音。”
languages.original_text: "That was not the Emperor, Lord Captain. It was merely Mistress Kibellah's vision of Him. A figment born out of her imagination. Alas, none among my fellows are powerful enough to bring you the voice of the Protector of Mankind."

traits.locale_text: “那并不是帝皇，舰长大人。那仅仅是绮贝菈女士对祂的想象，是她凭空捏造出来的。遗憾的是，我身边的同伴的力量不足，无法为您带来人类守护者真正的声音。”

languages.text: "Das war nicht der Imperator, Lord Captain. Das war lediglich Herrin Kibellahs Vision von Ihm. Ein Gespinst ihrer Vorstellungskraft. Leider ist niemand meiner Leute mächtig genug, um Euch die Stimme des Beschützers der Menschheit zu bringen."
languages.original_text: "That was not the Emperor, Lord Captain. It was merely Mistress Kibellah's vision of Him. A figment born out of her imagination. Alas, none among my fellows are powerful enough to bring you the voice of the Protector of Mankind."

traits.locale_text: "Das was nicht der Imperator, Lord Captain. Das war lediglich Herrin Kibellahs Vision von Ihm. Ein Gespinst ihrer Vorstellungskraft. Leider ist niemand meiner Leute mächtig genug, um Euch die Stimme des Beschützers der Menschheit zu bringen."

languages.text: "O, İmparator değildi Lord Kaptan. Yalnızca Kibellah Hanım'ın gözünden İmparator'un görüntüsüydü. Hayal gücünden doğmuş bir üründü. Ne yazık ki dostlarımdan hiçbiri, İnsanlığın Koruyucusu'nun sesini size duyuracak kadar güçlü değil."
languages.original_text: "That was not the Emperor, Lord Captain. It was merely Mistress Kibellah's vision of Him. A figment born out of her imagination. Alas, none among my fellows are powerful enough to bring you the voice of the Protector of Mankind."
